Autobahn|Cpp is a subproject of Autobahn and provides an open-source implementation of the The Web Application Messaging Protocol (WAMP) in C++.

Useful Links

  • The Autobahn Project
  • Autobahn @ Google Groups
  • AutobahnCpp @ GitHub
  • Issue Tracker
  • IRC: #autobahn on chat.freenode.net
